courseDescription: An interdisciplinary study of selected topics in the humanities.  These courses will appear in the course schedule booklet, and will be more fully described in a booklet distributed to academic advisors.
Interpersonal and Communication Skills: Effective presentation of humanities research findings
Collaborative writing and editing for academic publications
Organizational and Leadership Skills: Project management for interdisciplinary research projects
Facilitation of group discussions on humanities topics

courseDescription: An interdisciplinary study of selected topics in social studies.  These courses will appear in the course schedule booklet, and will be more fully described in a booklet distributed to academic advisors.
An advanced study of selected topics in humanities.
Problem-Solving and Analytical Skills: Identifying themes and trends in humanities research

courseDescription: An advanced study of selected topics in social studies.
Technical and Digital Skills: Data analysis techniques for social studies
Utilizing statistical software for social research
Interpersonal and Communication Skills: Presenting research findings to diverse audiences
Collaborating with peers on research projects
Effective communication of complex social concepts
Organizational and Leadership Skills: Leading group discussions on social issues

courseTitle: Tutorial Work in Arts and Letters Topics
courseDescription: Independent reading and study on a topic to be selected under the direction of an instructor. Conferences and papers as appropriate.
Technical and Digital Skills: Utilizing online databases for academic research
Digital formatting of papers and bibliographies
Interpersonal and Communication Skills: Effective communication with instructors for guidance
Presenting research findings in a clear and engaging manner
Problem-Solving and Analytical Skills: Critical analysis of texts and sources
Identifying themes and connections between different works
Organizational and Leadership Skills: Taking initiative in selecting and delving into a specific topic

courseDescription: An advanced study of selected topics in humanities.
Interpersonal and Communication Skills: Communicating complex ideas to diverse audiences
